featured.text: As of May 1, 1995, all nationals of the following 15 countries are exempted from securing visas for entry into the Republic of China: U.S.A., Japan, Canada, Belgium, Luxembourg, Sweden, Holland, New Zealand, Australia, Austria, Germany, Britain, France, Spain, and Portugal.

definition.zh_def: 荷蘭，指的是位於西歐的國家，官方名稱為荷蘭王國，主要由兩個主要島嶼組成，並以其風車、鬱金香和運河聞名。
definition.en_def: Holland refers to a region in the Netherlands, often used to denote the country as a whole, known for its windmills, tulips, and canals.
definition.example: I visited Holland last summer and enjoyed the beautiful tulip fields.
